articles.content:
Cloud9 Blue took down Vision Strikers in the Group D decider match today and are the first North American team to make it into the VALORANT Champions playoffs.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Doug Parker, architect of merger trend that resulted in four major US airlines, is retiring - CNN
articles.description: Doug Parker will retire in March as CEO of American Airlines, the airline that he made the world's largest through a series of mergers that led to a massive consolidation of the US airline industry.

articles.title: COVID-19 still found a way into a fully vaccinated crowd. Will Omicron make 'breakthrough infections' worse? - 07-Dec-2021 - NZ International news - NZCity
articles.description: While the world waits anxiously for information about Omicron, experts warn that Delta is still the dominant variant across the globe. An outbreak at an American high school reunion shows the power of the virus — and the potency of vaccines.
articles.content:
High school reunions have always been fraught with the possibility of awkwardness. 
When you hold one in a pandemic, the gathering of old friends, lovers and rivals becomes infinitely trickier.
The… [+5774 chars]
